name: image-optimization-script
description: Helper script for optimizing product images in public folder

scripts.optimize-images: echo 'Install imagemin-cli: npm install -g imagemin-cli' && echo 'Then run: imagemin public/images/products/*.jpg --out-dir=public/images/products/optimized --plugin=imagemin-mozjpeg'
scripts.check-images: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'public/images/products'; const images = ['headphones', 'smartwatch', 'speaker', 'mouse', 'keyboard', 'usb-hub']; images.forEach(img => { const exists = fs.existsSync(path + '/' + img + '.jpg') || fs.existsSync(path + '/' + img + '.png') || fs.existsSync(path + '/' + img + '.svg'); console.log(img + ': ' + (exists ? '✅' : '❌')); });"
